@POTUS promised to sign bill the Senate passed UNANIMOUSLY, but shut down govt over Wall he said Mexico’d pay for. Law enforcement officers & other govt employees working w/o pay - many others sent home w/no pay. Dems want effective border security but won't waste $ on his Wall.

Today Congress approved S.512, which includes language I spearheaded in the House with @RepKinzinger. This bill will provide transparency and certainty for nuclear power plants, so that they can continue producing carbon free energy that is essential to curbing climate change.

I recently met with @bendthearcpgh and agree we all must stand against hate. I join them in rejecting white nationalism & recognizing it as threat to individuals, communities & American democracy. America is a diverse, pluralistic nation -  that’s something we need to defend.

More disturbing acts in Pittsburgh, this time by the KKK. I am appalled that such hate continues to fester and has reared its ugly head in our community. We all have to do more to prevent it. https://www.wtae.com/article/hate-speech-flyers-scattered-throughout-pittsburgh-neighborhoods/25446578 …

23% of PA’s uninsured could get a bronze plan in the ACA marketplace with $0 premiums after tax credits – that’s 75,000 Pennsylvanians who haven’t signed up! #GetCovered on or before Saturday! https://www.kff.org/health-reform/issue-brief/how-many-of-the-uninsured-can-purchase-a-marketplace-plan-for-free/ …

As the city of Three Rivers, Pittsburgh has seen firsthand what unregulated pollution does to our rivers, streams, and wetlands. We have come too far to turn back the clock on these commonsense clean water protections. #ProtectCleanWater

For 45 years, the Clean Water Act has protected our water sources from pollution. @POTUS just released a #DirtyWaterRule to undermine these safeguards and favor polluters over clean water for our communities. #ProtectCleanWater
